name: Google Business Profile Trigger
semantic_context: Fetches reviews from Google Business Profile and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Business Profile Trigger 节点。主要用于: Fetches reviews from Google Business Profile and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: reviewAdded | (必填项)

account.name: account
account.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account | 作用: The Google Business Profile account | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

location.name: location
location.description: The specific location or business associated with the account
location.natural_language_description: 参数名: Location | 作用: The specific location or business associated with the account | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)
